section.p:
XML One London (March 2001)
Andrew Fawcett, of CODA, gave a presentation on XML data binding with Castor at the XML One conference in London, March 2001. Andrew has sent us his presentation and we will make this available soon.

O'Reilly Java Conference (March 2000)
The first public presentation on Castor was done at the O'Reilly Java Conference in March 2000. It's a little dated, but still serves as a decent overview of what Castor is all about. View the presentation.
